inputs.prompt: A cinematic, ultra-detailed image of a lone figure standing on a windswept cliff at sunrise, overlooking a vast ocean stretching to the horizon. The subject wears a flowing coat that catches the wind, fabric fibers and folds rendered with extreme realism, while soft golden sunlight breaks through layered clouds, casting long, dramatic shadows. Waves crash rhythmically against jagged rocks below, sending mist into the air that glows as it catches the light, creating subtle volumetric effects. The sky transitions from deep indigo to warm amber and pale peach tones, with thin clouds painted across it in natural gradients. Lighting is realistic and high dynamic range, with warm highlights along the subject’s silhouette and cooler ambient light filling the shadows. Shallow depth of field with crisp focus on the subject, cinematic composition using leading lines from the cliff edge, natural film grain, physically accurate materials, hyper-detailed textures, realistic atmosphere, balanced color grading, epic yet serene mood, ultra-high resolution, and a polished, award-winning cinematic photography aesthetic.
